Dependencies

You can install the WATcalendars Project on every Linux distribution if you install the following packages upfront.

Note

Playwright is officially supported only on Debian 12, Debian 13, Ubuntu 22.04 and Ubuntu 24.04 (for both x86-64 and ARM64 architectures).
On other Linux distributions, Playwright may not work correctly and could require workarounds such as using Docker or creating symbolic links for missing libraries.

python3
python3-pip
bs4
playwright
python-docx
requests
mammoth
docx2pdf
PyMuPDF
Pillow
 sh
